fn.p: Edited by: Islam S. Sobhy, Keele University, United Kingdom
Reviewed by: Jonathan Gershenzon, Max Planck Institute for Chemical Ecology, Germany; Michael J. Stout, Louisiana State University, United States; Nadir Erbilgin, University of Alberta, Canada
This article was submitted to Plant Pathogen Interactions, a section of the journal Frontiers in Plant Science
